Package stratego

package stratego
  • Class
    Description
    BluePlayer
    This class extends from Player class and overrides the abstract method.
    EnemyPiece
    This class implements the Piece interface and includes game's pieces for the enemy.
    Game
    This class implements game rules and conditions of moving pieces and printing board game.
    Move
    This enum class is for moving pieces.
    Piece
    This interface implements common features that all the pieces have.
    Player
    This abstract class has 2 method and an abstract method that should override in the other classes.
    PlayerPiece
    This enum class implements the Piece interface and includes game's pieces with their features as power, count and being movable.
    RedPlayer
    This class extends from Player class and overrides the abstract method.
    Run
    This class has a main method and the program runs here.
    SelectPlayer
    This class is for selecting what color you want to be.
